import math

def jump_search(arr, x):
    n = len(arr)
    step = int(math.sqrt(n))
    prev = 0
    
    while arr[min(step, n)-1] < x:
        prev = step
        step += int(math.sqrt(n))
        if prev >= n:
            return -1
    
    while arr[prev] < x:
        prev += 1
        if prev == min(step, n):
            return -1
    if arr[prev] == x:
        return prev
    return -1

arr = [1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13, 15, 17]
x = 13
result = jump_search(arr, x)
print("Element found at index:", result)
